articles.title: Leader of armed border group pleads guilty to gun charge
articles.description: ALBUQUERQUE, N.M. (AP) — The leader of an armed group that detained asylum-seeking families near the U.S.-Mexico border has pleaded guilty in New Mexico to a federal firearms charge.
articles.content:
ALBUQUERQUE, N.M. (AP) The leader of an armed group that detained asylum-seeking families near the U.S.-Mexico border has pleaded guilty in New Mexico to a federal firearms charge.

articles.author: By JOE REEDY AP Sports Writer
articles.title: Chargers GM Telesco won't make quick decision about Rivers
articles.description: COSTA MESA, Calif. (AP) — Tom Telesco isn't going to make any quick decisions in the wake of the Los Angeles Chargers' disappointing 5-11 season. But the team's general manager does have a long list of things that have to…
articles.content: COSTA MESA, Calif. (AP) Tom Telesco isn't going to make any quick decisions in the wake of the Los Angeles Chargers' disappointing 5-11 season. But the team's general manager does have a long list of things that have to be completed before free agency begins … [+1137 chars]

articles.title: Grant lifts Bryant past St. Francis (Pa) 67-63
articles.description: SMITHFIELD, R.I. (AP) — Adam Grant had 20 points as Bryant narrowly beat St. Francis (Pa.) 67-63 on Thursday in their first Northeast Conference game of the season.
articles.content:
SMITHFIELD, R.I. (AP) Adam Grant had 20 points as Bryant narrowly beat St. Francis (Pa.) 67-63 on Thursday in their first Northeast Conference game of the season.
Benson Lin had 14 points for Bryant (9-5). Hall Elisias added 12 points, seven rebounds and fou… [+976 chars]

articles.title: 2 charged with murder in death of north Arkansas man
articles.description: MOUNTAIN HOME, Ark. (AP) — Two men have been charged with murder in the death of a 20-year-old north Arkansas man whose remains were found in December after he had been reported missing months earlier, authorities announced Thursday.
articles.content:
MOUNTAIN HOME, Ark. (AP) Two men have been charged with murder in the death of a 20-year-old north Arkansas man whose remains were found in December after he had been reported missing months earlier, authorities announced Thursday.

articles.title: Tribal leaders plan alternative to State of Tribes Address

articles.title: No. 22 Lady Vols open SEC schedule by beating Missouri 77-66
articles.description: KNOXVILLE, Tenn. (AP) — Rennia Davis had 19 points and 12 rebounds as No. 22 Tennessee defeated Missouri 77-66 on Thursday in the Southeastern Conference opener for both teams.
articles.content:
KNOXVILLE, Tenn. (AP) Rennia Davis had 19 points and 12 rebounds as No. 22 Tennessee defeated Missouri 77-66 on Thursday in the Southeastern Conference opener for both teams.

articles.author: By DON THOMPSON Associated Press
articles.title: Report: California cops more likely to stop black drivers
articles.description: SACRAMENTO, Calif. (AP) — Black drivers in California were stopped by police at 2.5 times the per capita rate of whites and searched three times as often, according to the latest report Thursday from a first-in-the-nation attempt to track racial…

articles.title: Democratic Party lawsuit back before judge
articles.description: MONTGOMERY, Ala. (AP) — The Alabama Supreme Court has returned a lawsuit over control of the state Democratic Party to a Montgomery judge for resolution.
articles.content:
